Basis - Local San Francisco, CA, USA (startup, 60 people, funded) http://www.mybasis.com/

Help us make people healthier! Our product is a wearable device that tracks body health using sensors that monitor heart rate, perspiration, temperature, and motion. This data is collected and processed into insights and visualizations which help our customers build healthier habits. We are looking for all kinds of engineers. Detailed job descriptions can be found at: http://www.mybasis.com/careers/

Some of our currently open positions include: * Software Engineer, Data Analysis * Senior Software Engineer, Architecture * DevOps Engineer * Backend Software Engineer * Software Engineer in Test * iOS Software Engineer * Research Engineer * Senior Firmware Engineer * Embedded Systems (Electrical / Mechanical) Fall Internship * Quality Assurance Manager
